DOWNLOAD_CONTROLLER_ERROR_TYPE.description: An error message for download process

DOWNLOAD_CONTROLLER_ERROR_NO_TEXTS.message: You should define original and translation texts first
DOWNLOAD_CONTROLLER_ERROR_NO_TEXTS.description: An error message for download process

TEXTS_CONTROLLER_EMPTY_FILE_DATA.message: The file doesn't have all the required fields. Text won't be created.
TEXTS_CONTROLLER_EMPTY_FILE_DATA.description: An error message for upload data from file.

TEXTS_CONTROLLER_EMPTY_DB_DATA.message: There is not enough information for retrieving alignment from DB.
TEXTS_CONTROLLER_EMPTY_DB_DATA.description: An error message for upload data from file.

TEXTS_CONTROLLER_INCORRECT_DB_DATA.message: This alignment data is corrupted in database and could not be uploaded.
TEXTS_CONTROLLER_INCORRECT_DB_DATA.description: An error message for upload data from database.

TEXTS_CONTROLLER_ERROR_WRONG_ALIGNMENT_S.message: You should start from defining original text first.

ALIGNED_CONTROLLER_NOT_READY_FOR_TOKENIZ.message: Document source texts are not ready for tokenization.

ALIGNED_CONTROLLER_NOT_EQUAL_SEGMENTS.message: The tokenization process was cancelled because original and translation texts don't have the same amount of segments.

ALIGNED_CONTROLLER_NOT_FINISHED_GROUP.message: You have an unfinished alignment group. You should finish it or undone first and then go to the next tab.

ALIGNED_CONTROLLER_TOKENIZATION_STARTED.description: An info message that is published before tokenization started.

ALIGNED_CONTROLLER_TOKENIZATION_FINISHED.description: An info message that is published after tokenization finished.

TOKENIZE_CONTROLLER_ERROR_NOT_REGISTERED.description: An error message for tokenization workflow

UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_ERROR_TYPE.description: An error message for upload workflow

UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_ERROR_WRONG_FORMAT.message: Uploaded file has wrong format for the type - plainSourceUploadFromFile.
UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_ERROR_WRONG_FORMAT.description: An error message for upload workflow

SETTINGS_CONTROLLER_NO_VALUES_CLASS.message: There is no class for uploading settings values that is regestered as {className}
SETTINGS_CONTROLLER_NO_VALUES_CLASS.description: An error message for settings upload workflow

TOKENS_EDIT_IS_NOT_EDITABLE_ERROR.message: This token is inside created alignment group, you should ungroup it first.
TOKENS_EDIT_IS_NOT_EDITABLE_ERROR.description: An error message for token edit workflow

UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_EXTENSION_UNAVAILABLE.message: File extension {extension} is not supported. The only supported file extensions are .txt and .xml.
UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_EXTENSION_UNAVAILABLE.description: An error message for upload workflow

UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_INCORRECT_XML_DATA.message: This xml file does not have AlpheiosV1 format and could not be uploaded.
UPLOAD_CONTROLLER_INCORRECT_XML_DATA.description: An error message for upload data from xml file.

DOWNLOAD_CONTROLLER_TYPE_SHORT_TOOLTIP.message: download only source texts without tokens and alignment groups

DOWNLOAD_CONTROLLER_TYPE_FULL_TOOLTIP.message: download source texts, tokens and segments, alignment groups
